amendment.description: To ensure that the storage and transportation of petroleum coke is regulated in a manner that ensures the protection of public and ecological health.

vote.text: Amendment SA 69, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 8.

action.text: Amendment SA 69 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 2.

Roll call votes on amendments in Senate: Amendment SA 69, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 8.

Senate amendment not agreed to: Amendment SA 69, under the order of 1/21/15, not having achieved 60 votes in the affirmative, was not agreed to in Senate by Yea-Nay Vote. 41 - 58. Record Vote Number: 8.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 69 proposed by Senator Durbin to Amendment SA 2.
